cause.description:
Well someone out the ladies and gentlemen are hatin on my penguins and that can't be happenin they are super cute and i love them so show your love for that penguin and join my cause LOVE THE PENGUINS HEHE
1. penguins are cute
2. penguins waddle
3. penguins have happy feet and love to surf
cause.name: I love Penguins!!!
